But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure

Discover local businesses around your current location. Just tab on the pin you are interested in and you will see their Local Big App page where you will find more information including pictures, coupons, events and contact information.
This is where and how your business will appear in the map. The more information you provide in your profile will help your target audience reach your business.
This will keep you up to date with coupons and events from the businesses you love!
Win your customers hearts and your business will be one of their favorites.
Keep your calendar full with all the entertaining events local businesses host.
Update your customers with all the great events your business offers. Add pictures and be very descriptive with what makes you event special!
Save money and get great value by using the coupons local businesses offer.
Attract new costumers with irresistible deals!
Create an account to manage your business profile, upload pictures, create events and coupons. You can also stay updated with other local businesses in your area.
